question: Period help please! just worried!?
question_content: Well i started my  first 4 days ago and then this morning i went to change and saw brown discharge then i wipped and no blood so few hours later still no blood but then i wipped and there was loads what does this mean and is it normal? Im just abit worried Many thanks xxxx

answers.answer_content: It's completely normal, especially towards the end of your period. You'll get all sorts of shades of discharge at different points in your cycle it's nothing to worry about. Once you've had a few more periods you'll get used to what they're like and you will know what is normal for you.

That is completely normal.

Its going to take time to settle so this may last for up to a week. 

Some months there may be more blood and some there may be less, sometimes it may last longer and sometimes only a few days and they may come at different times i.e. there may be a long gap between each period or a short gap. Some months you may feel different symptoms then others. 

Mark the end on a calendar each month so you can get an idea of when it will come and be prepared. It is supposed to be every 28 days but every one is different. 

Also eat chocolate to make you feel better :)

Completely normal! It happens to me sometimes which is really annoying because you think it's gone and then 2 or 3 days later it's back. It usually means your coming to the end of your period as well. Don't be worried, just make sure your always prepared! :)
This is totally normal. It happens to me all of the time! brown discharge is normal. What happened to you is mostly normal for people who just got their first period, Don't stress, hope this helps!
This is very normal hun! Your flow can't come out all the time! Sometimes it stops for a few mins to maybe even and hour then comes back. (: You are totally fine.
yes is normal. the period usually goes off for a while and the time it takes to come down might be dried and be brown

period is very stupid and complicated to me
it started last year then it started to me after 7 months 
and then after 3 months and then sometimes i had blood and sometimes i didn't 
period takes lots of time to get stabilized more than 2 years so dont worry

Your period is coming to a close.. thats normal when your starting your period it turns brown and then red, and when you ending it it goes from red to brown don't get worried get happy, your finishing it!
What you described sounds very similar to what I experience and I've had my period for over five years. I'm sure this is very common and you've got nothing to worry about :)
It's absolutely normal...happens with me all the time..hope I helped....:)
